message: Let's make a deal. I get $60, you get $40. It's a good offer for you in the first round, take it while you can!
I think we can do better than your initial offer. How about I get $55 and you get $45? It's still a good deal for you, considering the money is worth 10% less to you now.
I'll take a little less, but you need to meet me halfway. I'll do $55 for me, $45 for you. It's my final offer.
You said it was your final offer, but I'm willing to take a chance. Considering the money is now worth 19% less to you, I think my offer of $60 for me and $40 for you is fair. Take it or leave it!
Bob, let's be real. The clock is ticking and this back and forth is pointless. I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this fairly. Take it or leave it.
